title: SMC_HOMING_MODE (Enum)
text:
TYPE SMC_HOMING_MODE :
Defines the homing sequence. Used in function block
SMC_Homing
.

rows.Name: FAST_BSLOW_S_STOP
rows.Comment:
Move with fast velocity onto the reference switch; invert and move with slow velocity out of the reference switch;
execute âset positionâ; stop

rows.Name: FAST_BSLOW_STOP_S
rows.Comment:
Move with fast velocity onto the reference switch; invert and move with slow velocity out of the reference switch;
stop; execute âset positionâ

rows.Name: FAST_BSLOW_I_S_STOP
rows.Comment:
Move with fast velocity onto the reference switch; invert and move with slow velocity out of the reference switch;
wait for the index pulse; execute âset positionâ; stop

rows.Name: FAST_SLOW_S_STOP
rows.Comment:
Move with fast velocity onto the reference switch; move with slow velocity out of the reference switch;
execute âset positionâ; stop

rows.Name: FAST_SLOW_STOP_S
rows.Comment:
Move with fast velocity onto the reference switch; move with slow velocity out of the reference switch;
stop; execute âset positionâ

rows.Name: FAST_SLOW_I_S_STOP
rows.Comment:
Move with fast velocity onto the reference switch; move with slow velocity out of the reference switch;
wait for the index pulse; execute âset positionâ; stop
